name: Insperation from ''https://www.linkedin.com/posts/uditagowdety_over-the-weekend-i-took-up-the-challenge-activity-7164948036136239104-xiy0/''
description: Did something similar, With the help of p5.js, I created particles that move along random lines (using Perlin noise). I used vectors and a particle class to draw lines that slowly change color.
